topic.title: HPOC Problems Sub Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.7.3.1.1.26.2.3.5"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11450-4-HPOC" HPOC Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, Contains at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys Contains exactly one [1..1] act, where its type is HPOC Problem Concern
Contains exactly one [1..1] HPOC Problem Concern (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.7.3.1.1.26.2.4.17)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11450-4-HPOC" HPOC Problem List (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, Contains at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys Contains exactly one [1..1] act, where its type is HPOC Problem Concern
Contains exactly one [1..1] HPOC Problem Concern (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.7.3.1.1.26.2.4.17)
